snippet: Djokovic beat fifth-seeded Stan Wawrinka, 6-4, 6-1, at the Western & Southern Open, while Williams defeated Ana Ivanovic, 3-6, 6-4, 6-2.
abstract: Serena Williams and Novak Djokovic advance to semifinals in Western & Southern Open; other tennis results noted.
lead_paragraph: Djokovic beat fifth-seeded Stan Wawrinka, 6-4, 6-1, at the Western & Southern Open, while Williams defeated Ana Ivanovic, 3-6, 6-4, 6-2.

headline.main: Novak Djokovic and Serena Williams Advance
